Package org.eclipse.gef4.geometry

Provides basic geometric concepts.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Angle An Angle object abstracts the angle's unit.
Dimension Represents a dimension (width, height) in 2-dimensional space.
Point Represents a point (x, y) in 2-dimensional space.
 

Enum Summary
Angle.AngleUnit The Angle.Angle(double, AngleUnit) constructor uses this enumeration to differentiate the unit of its first argument.
 

Package org.eclipse.gef4.geometry Description

Provides basic geometric concepts.
